iti27:2.1_1: opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni sabbāni tāni mettāya cetovimuttiyā kalaṁ nāgghanti soḷasiṁ.

iti27:4.2_2: mettāyeva tāni cetovimutti adhiggahetvā bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca.
